article.name: ModStore Targeted Training Filter Overview
article.title: ModStore Targeted Training Filter Overview
article.body:
You can use the Targeted Training search filter to find content that is specific to a certain industry or role within your organization. For example, the training you want the finance department to take may be different from the type of training you want the IT department to take.

Follow the steps below to use this filter:

  1. Log in to your KnowBe4 account and click the Modstore tab.
  2. Click on the + on the right-hand side of the gray Additional Filters box.
  3. Click the applicable category or select All Targeted Training.After clicking on a filter within the Targeted Training drop-down menu, you will see our recommended training for that industry or role.

The following Targeted Training categories are available in your ModStore:

California Healthcare Staff

 This category includes training content on California health privacy.
Canada Private Sector Staff This category includes training content on anti-spam legislation, the Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act (PIPEDA), and private sector privacy. 
Customer Service Team This category includes training content on handling Personally Identifiable Information (PII) and common social engineering threats such as pretexting. 
Developers This category includes training content on the Open Web Application Security Project (OWASP) and building secure software.
Energy Sector Staff This category includes training content on the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) and North American Electric Reliability Corporation (NERC).
Executives | Leaders This category includes training content on CEO fraud and using mobile devices. 
Finance Staff This category includes training content on CEO fraud and Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act (GLBA).
Frequent Travelers This category includes training content on traveling securely and working remotely with cybersecurity in mind.
IT Staff This category includes training content on privileged access management and secure employee offboarding.
Payment Card Processors This category includes training content on the Payment Card Industry (PCI).
U.S. Education Employees This category includes training content on the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA).
U.S. Healthcare Staff This category includes training content on Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) and Protected Health Information (PHI).
U.S. State/Federal Government Staff This category includes training content on the Federal Information Security Management Act (FISMA) and criminal justice information services security.
